subject: Can't find good drug store
body:
Dear customer.
The pharmacy you shop at got too expensive? Why spend more if you have the opportunity to buy medications of the same generic quality for less?
Our advice for everyone shopping for medications on the Web is to cling to reliable licensed pharmacies that have been operating on the Internet market for quite a long time already (such as CanadianPharmacy). Want to save on drugs? Try CanadianPharmacy - #1 discount Canadian pharmacy.
CanadianPharmacy the only Canadian Web pharmacy to be recommended by FDA.
Yours faithfully,Dean Hand
